hotels.title: Romantic Adults-Only Caribbean Island Escape with All-Inclusive Dining & Drinks
hotels.description: Fall in love all over again at the adults-only Galley Bay Resort & Spa, surrounded by lush greenery, white sands and the sparkling waters of the Caribbean. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Best of the Best 2022 award, ranking it among the top 1% of properties, the secluded resort offers all-inclusive dining and free-flow alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks at exquisite open-air restaurants and authentic beachfront bars. Embrace the Caribbean spirit with evening island-inspired live music and weekly barbecue nights, along with plenty of opportunities to explore the spectacular islands and nearby villages.
